scenes.visual_description: Vibrant, digital comic book art. Close-up on a glowing red button labeled "System Override." Sparks fly from exposed wires around it. Style: Cyberpunk, dramatic lighting.
Wide shot. A futuristic control room bathed in flickering red emergency lights. A lone figure in a black hoodie reaches for the button. Style: Cyberpunk, high contrast.
Extreme close-up. The figure's finger presses the button. The red glow intensifies, blinding. Style: Abstract digital art, intense color gradients.
Wide shot. The control room explodes in a burst of pure white light. Style: Abstract digital art, minimal, white background with expanding shockwave effect.
